summary: A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.

Kemp|Colin Kenny|Thomas Martin|Lester Matthews|Phyllis Morris|Edgar Norton|'Snub' Pollard|John Rice|Scott Seaton|Bert Stevens|Arthur Tovey|Chalky Williams|John Williams
title: El proceso Paradine
